nodes.bodyText: Quick question: kokoro/continuous.sh runs build and integrationTest. What's the difference between build and check?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,8 +39,8 @@ if [[ $(git status -uno --porcelain) ]]; then
   Die 'There are uncommitted changes.'
 fi
 
-# Runs integration tests.
-./gradlew :jib-build-plan:integrationTest --info --stacktrace
+# Runs checks and integration tests.
+./gradlew :jib-build-plan:check :jib-build-plan:integrationTest --info --stacktrace

nodes.bodyText: yeah I should've mentioned, build  already runs check (but not integrationTest, we always have had integration test be explicit)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,8 +39,8 @@ if [[ $(git status -uno --porcelain) ]]; then
   Die 'There are uncommitted changes.'
 fi
 
-# Runs integration tests.

+# Runs checks and integration tests.
+./gradlew :jib-build-plan:check :jib-build-plan:integrationTest --info --stacktrace

nodes.bodyText: check runs all tests, checkstyle and format things
